card.name: Ponman Statue
card.description: {{KW:SYNERGY}}: Give +2 {{ATK}} and {{KW:HASTE}} to {{TRIBE:PIECE|2}} at its right and +2 {{HP}} and {{KW:TAUNT}} to {{TRIBE:PIECE|2}} at its left.

description.now: {{KW:SYNERGY}}: Give +2 {{ATK}} and {{KW:HASTE}} to {{TRIBE:PIECE|2}} at its right and +2 {{HP}} and {{KW:TAUNT}} to {{TRIBE:PIECE|2}} at its left.
description.prev: {{KW:MAGIC}}: If played on the left, give an ally {{TRIBE:PIECE|1}} +2 {{ATK}} and {{KW:TRANSPARENCY}}. If played on the right, give an ally {{TRIBE:PIECE|1}} +2 {{HP}} and {{KW:CANDY}}. {{KW:SYNERGY}}: Give it both.
